statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Find the fraction closest to sqrt(N), the denominator of the fraction is no more than M.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: The input consists of multiple test cases.For each case the input contains two integers N and M, 1<=N<=1000000, 1<=M<=1000.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each case output one line, contaning the fraction that in the form "A/B" where A and B are positive integers with no common factors greater than one.
